product_name: Continental Grand Prix Foldable Tire - 700 x 23
long_description: Continental Grand Prix foldable clincher tire offers fast road performance, thanks to low rolling resistance, grippy rubber and good puncture protection! Black Chili compound delivers excellent all-around performance, supplying great traction, longevity and low rolling resistance. PolyX Breaker puncture protection extends from shoulder-to-shoulder for protection under the entire tread. 180 tpi casing is supple for great road feel; folding bead helps keep weight low. Recommended pressure for the Continental Grand Prix foldable clincher tire is 110 psi (7.5 bar), maximum 120 psi (8.5 bar).
short_description: Continental Grand Prix foldable clincher tire offers fast road performance, thanks to low rolling resistance, grippy rubber and good puncture protection!
